Events that occurred on 3 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1911 - Swedish translator Ã…ke Ohlmarks is born.
1930 - Author Marion Zimmer Bradley is born.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 101.
1947 - Voice actor Matthew Locricchio is born.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the University of Oxford.
1998 - Producer William Lawrence Snyder dies.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Atlanta Symphony Hall, Georgia.
2005 - Tolkien Gateway opens as a wiki.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events on this day.
